snippet: The back-and-forth budget proposals by Republicans and Democrats have fixated the market, but many investors expect the two sides to come up with a deal before the year-end deadline.
abstract: Stocks close little changed as budget talks continue in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The back-and-forth budget proposals by Republicans and Democrats have fixated the market, but many investors expect the two sides to come up with a deal before the year-end deadline.

headline.main: As Budget Talks Continue, Markets Change Little
headline.print_headline: As Budget Talks Continue, Markets Change Little
